By Peter on Wednesday, June 3, 2009 - 04:07 am:

You know, like how Kurasu Soratobu(is the spelling
right?) wrote a huge FAQ about Monster Rancher 2. If
anyone hasn't, I could be able to write one.

By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, June 3, 2009 - 09:51 am:

We aren't that interested in one large document. Especially since they get 'stolen' and reprinted so easily. (meaning that people think that gamewinners has good contributors and don't bother to look beyond it)

We would appreciate you posting the information you have, here, in the appropriate sections.

If all you want to do is take the info that we already have on this site and re-post it on another site, then, no, we do not need anyone raping us again.

Kurasu did the MR2 FAQ because pretty much all of that basic info had been stolen by other sites and re-published as if they wrote it. -Some people even stuck it into FAQs and gave us no credit at all. So, she did it as a way to inform people that we were the original MR2 research site and that we had made those discoveries.

Also, remember that Kurasu got permission to use all of the info she used -from each individual author. I doubt that anyone will agree to do that again, as it was not such a success. -It's all over the web oftentimes missing all of the credits.

By Peter on Wednesday, June 3, 2009 - 10:53 pm:

Ok, thank you for answering.
